title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Thailand 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes GDP growth compared to previous year. In total the number of data points it has is 11.
Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has increased over the Year.
GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2015, and lastly roughly constant from 2015 to 2024.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum GDP growth compared to previous year, about 4.13 was reported at Year 2018
The lowest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 0.98 was reported at Year 2014

max_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes GDP growth compared to previous year. In total the number of data points it has is 11.
In general GDP growth compared to previous year has rose over the Year.
GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2015, and lastly roughly constant from 2015 to 2024.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum GDP growth compared to previous year, about 4.13 was reported at Year 2018
The lowest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 0.98 was reported at Year 2014
The line drastically increased by 3.2 times from Year 2014 to 2015.
